an10.75:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an10.75:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena migasalaya upasikaya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an10.75:1.3: Atha kho migasala upasika yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinna kho migasala upasika ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an10.75:2.1: “Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayam.
an10.75:2.2: Pita me, bhante, purano brahmacari hoti aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an10.75:2.3: So kalankato bhagavata byakato: ‘sakadagami satto tusitam kayam upapanno’ti.
an10.75:2.4: Pitamaho me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacari ahosi sadarasantuttho.
an10.75:2.5: Sopi kalankato bhagavata byakato: ‘sakadagami satto tusitam kayam upapanno’ti.
an10.75:3.1: Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayan”ti?
an10.75:4.1: Atha kho ayasma anando migasalaya upasikaya nivesane pindapatam gahetva utthayasana pakkami.
an10.75:4.2: Atha kho ayasma anando pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.75:5.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena migasalaya upasikaya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidim.
an10.75:5.2: Atha kho, bhante, migasala upasika yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinna kho, bhante, migasala upasika mam etadavoca:
an10.75:6.1: ‘Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayam.
an10.75:6.2: Pita me, bhante, purano brahmacari ahosi aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an10.75:6.3: So kalankato bhagavata byakato sakadagami satto tusitam kayam upapannoti.
an10.75:6.4: Pitamaho me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacari ahosi sadarasantuttho.
an10.75:6.5: Sopi kalankato bhagavata byakato—sakadagami satto tusitam kayam upapannoti.
an10.75:7.1: Katham katham namayam, bhante ananda, bhagavata dhammo desito anneyyo, yatra hi nama brahmacari ca abrahmacari ca ubho samasamagatika bhavissanti abhisamparayan’ti?
an10.75:7.2: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, migasalam upasikam etadavocam:
an10.75:8.1: “Ka cananda, migasala upasika bala abyatta ammaka ammakapanna, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariye nane?
an10.75:9.1: Dasayime, ananda, puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an10.75:9.4: Tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati, yatthassa tam dussilyam aparisesam nirujjhati.
an10.75:9.5: Tassa savanenapi akatam hoti, bahusaccenapi akatam hoti, ditthiyapi appatividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim na labhati.
an10.75:9.6: So kayassa bheda param marana hanaya pareti, no visesaya;
an10.75:10.1: Idha panananda, ekacco puggalo dussilo hoti.
an10.75:10.2: Tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa tam dussilyam aparisesam nirujjhati.
an10.75:10.3: Tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an10.75:10.4: So kayassa bheda param marana visesaya pareti, no hanaya;
an10.75:11.2: ‘imassapi teva dhamma, aparassapi teva dhamma. Kasma nesam eko hino eko panito’ti?
an10.75:11.3: Tanhi tesam, ananda, hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an10.75:12.2: Tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa tam dussilyam aparisesam nirujjhati.
an10.75:12.3: Tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an10.75:12.4: Ayam, ananda, puggalo amuna purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an10.75:12.11: Aham va, ananda, puggalesu pamanam ganheyyam yo va panassa madiso.
an10.75:13.1: Idha panananda, ekacco puggalo silava hoti.

an10.75:22.1: Idha panananda, ekacco puggalo uddhato hoti.
an10.75:22.2: Tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati yatthassa tam uddhaccam aparisesam nirujjhati.
an10.75:22.3: Tassa savanenapi akatam hoti, bahusaccenapi akatam hoti, ditthiyapi appatividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim na labhati.
an10.75:22.4: So kayassa bheda param marana hanaya pareti, no visesaya;
an10.75:23.1: Idha panananda, ekacco puggalo uddhato hoti.
an10.75:23.2: Tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa tam uddhaccam aparisesam nirujjhati.
an10.75:23.3: Tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an10.75:23.4: So kayassa bheda param marana visesaya pareti, no hanaya;
an10.75:24.2: ‘imassapi teva dhamma, aparassapi teva dhamma. Kasma nesam eko hino eko panito’ti?
an10.75:24.3: Tanhi tesam, ananda, hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an10.75:25.1: Tatrananda, yvayam puggalo uddhato hoti tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa tam uddhaccam aparisesam nirujjhati,
an10.75:25.2: tassa savanenapi katam hoti, bahusaccenapi katam hoti, ditthiyapi patividdham hoti, samayikampi vimuttim labhati.
an10.75:25.3: Ayam, ananda, puggalo amuna purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
an10.75:25.10: Aham va, ananda, puggalesu pamanam ganheyyam yo va panassa madiso.
an10.75:26.1: Ka cananda, migasala upasika bala abyatta ammaka ammakapanna, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariye nane.
an10.75:26.2: Ime kho, ananda, dasa puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an10.75:27.1: Yatharupena, ananda, silena purano samannagato ahosi tatharupena silena isidatto samannagato abhavissa, nayidha purano isidattassa gatimpi annassa.
an10.75:27.2: Yatharupaya cananda, pannaya isidatto samannagato ahosi tatharupaya pannaya purano samannagato abhavissa, nayidha isidatto puranassa gatimpi annassa.
an10.75:27.3: Iti kho, ananda, ime puggala ubho ekangahina”ti.
